item.title: Enabling LaTeX rendering in Hugo
item.description: Some Hugo themes might have LaTeX rendering support built in, but they are usually not well documented. It may be worth looking through the layouts directory of your theme, to see if there are any files called math.html, katex.html, or math-jax.html. If there are, you likely have support for LaTeX rendering already enabled, and so all you would need to do this add a math variable to your front matter for any posts on your site.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! I’m Andy and I am a fourth year Electronic Engineering student from Ireland. This website is a place for me to store college notes that I write, blog posts that I may write about some of the topics I am interested in (see below), as well as show off any projects I do. Don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or comments. :)
